subtitleNullable: A 3D dataset for American Sign Language Digits
descriptionNullable:
Three distinct objects demonstrate American Sign Language (ASL) digits from 0 to 9 against diverse backgrounds.

4. H.P. Nguyen and B. Ribeiro. Action recognition for american sign language. In 24th Portuguese Conference on Pattern Recognition (RECPAD). RECPAD, 2018.
5. N. H. Phong, B. Ribeiro. Rethinking recurrent neural networks and other improvements for image classification. arXiv preprint arXiv:2007.15161, 2020.
